text: This test is much much too slow. Someone should look at it and see if we can make it faster.
title: Slow test: nilearn.image.tests.test_resampling.test_resample_img_segmentation_fault

text: Linked to #736. By using ulimit, we can reduce the memory available and maybe trigger the segfault faster.

> Linked to #736. By using ulimit, we can reduce the memory available and maybe trigger the segfault faster.

Not entirely sure this is true. The segmentation fault is due to an int32 array index wrapping over IIRC.
